game.title: The Lost Crown
game.objective: Retrieve the lost crown of the king.
game.description: The king's crown was stolen by a group of bandits. The king has offered a reward for its return.

task.description: The bandits are hiding in a cave in the mountains.

task.objective: Defeat the bandits and retrieve the crown.
task.description: The bandits are a tough group, so be prepared for a fight.

task.objective: Return the crown to the king.
task.description: Once you have the crown, return it to the king in the castle.
